rows.label: qst701801_msg0001
rows.name: It's a promise, yeah? No backsies!

rows.label: qst701801_msg0002
rows.name: What's going on here?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0003
rows.name: Kasumi-san!

rows.label: qst701801_msg0004
rows.name:
Um, do you think you could teach
me needlework?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0005
rows.name:
Needlework? Of course, but this is
very sudden! If you need something
sewed, you could just give it to me...

rows.label: qst701801_msg0006
rows.name: No, it's OK. I want to do it myself.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0007
rows.name:
But I suck. There's no getting away
from that. So you gotta help me.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0008
rows.name: This is unusually conscientious of you.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0009
rows.name:
I made a promise.
I have to see it through.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0011
rows.name:
Well then. What kind of thing would
you like to learn to make?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0012
rows.name: Uhm...I don't know yet.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0013
rows.name:
You should pick a pattern you like
for your first attempt. Maybe a
favorite food item or an animal?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0014
rows.name: In that case...

rows.label: qst701801_msg0015
rows.name:
He's going to say "Adel-sama" or
something. You'd never be able to pull
that off, Milt.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0016
rows.name: Shut up! I know that!

rows.label: qst701801_msg0017
rows.name: I was going to say the Iiran emblem.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0018
rows.name:
Hmm. It's fairly intricate, but why not?
Let's give it a go.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0019
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0020
rows.name:
A simple handkerchief should be
doable as a first project.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0021
rows.name:
We need the right materials. With the
thread I have to hand, I don't think
we'll be able to match the colors.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0022
rows.name:
If you don't have it, we'll just go get
what you need. That's better than
making do.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0023
rows.name:
OK then. I'll need three Golden Sand
Cocoons, three Cotton Branches, and
two sprigs of Bladed Holly...

rows.label: qst701801_msg0024
rows.name:
...Yes, I think that should do it.
Just get me those and I'll take care
of the rest.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0025
rows.name:
Golden Sand Cocoons...?
Uhh, wasn't Adel-sama talking
about those the other day?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0026
rows.name:
Er, what did he say, again...? That
they're made by some rare bugs that
live in the, uh, Streamsand Corridor?

rows.label: qst701801_msg0027
rows.name:
Exactly right, Milt. It's not the
easiest material to find, but we'll try to
get ourselves some before too long.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0028
rows.name:
Thanks Kasumi-san!
And Hikari I guess.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0029
rows.name:
It's fine. I'll find a way for you
to return the favor...with interest.

rows.label: qst701801_msg0030
rows.name: Hey, no fair!

rows.label: qst701801_msg0031
rows.name:
That'll teach you to be cheeky in
future. You better appreciate what
I'm doing here!
